categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ishla was a female pureblood Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, she was stationed at the Imperial Garrison, where she shared her experience and knowledge with other Sith Warriors.
Lord Ishla appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a class trainer for the Sith Warrior class on Quesh.
